title: How many more patches until the +500 MB of new client files per patch is complete?
body: League folder's getting pretty large and bloated for no reason (other than the fact there is essentially 2 clients in it)

replies.body: We are moving towards the updated client so you may see some additional files.  You could see the files integrated and any extra stuff discarded in the future, though I'm not part of the client teams so I can't really say anything for sure.  I don't have any information beyond that, but feel free to offer any feedback on this to our client developers over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Let me know if that clears things up!
